name: Harvest Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Harvest Tool 节点。主要用于: Access data on Harvest

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Access data on Harvest | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken
available_options: Access Token (值: accessToken)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: task
available_options: Client (值: client)
Company (值: company)
Contact (值: contact)
Estimate (值: estimate)
Expense (值: expense)
Invoice (值: invoice)
Project (值: project)
Task (值: task)
Time Entry (值: timeEntry)
User (值: user)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: me
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a user
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a user
Get (值: get) - Get data of a user
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get data of many users
Me (值: me) - Get data of authenticated user
Update (值: update) - Update a user
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
accountId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: is_active (值: None) - Whether to only return active users and false to return inactive users
updated_since (值: None) - Only return users belonging to the user with the given ID
page (值: None) - The page number to use in pagination

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the time entry to update
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Time Entry ID | 作用: The ID of the time entry to update | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the task | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: can_create_invoices (值: None) - Whether the user can create invoices. Only applicable to Project Managers.
can_create_projects (值: None) - Whether the user can create projects. Only applicable to Project Managers.
can_see_rates (值: None) - Whether the user can see billable rates on projects. Only applicable to Project Managers.
cost_rate (值: None) - The cost rate to use for this user when calculating a project’s costs vs billable amount
default_hourly_rate (值: None) - The billable rate to use for this user when they are added to a project
has_access_to_all_future_projects (值: None) - Whether the user should be automatically added to future projects
is_active (值: None) - Whether the user is active or archived
is_admin (值: None) - Whether the user has Admin permissions
is_contractor (值: None) - Whether the user is a contractor or an employee
is_project_manager (值: None) - Whether the user has Project Manager permissions
roles (值: None) - The role names assigned to this person
timezone (值: None) - The user’s timezone. Defaults to the company’s timezone. See a list of supported time zones.
weekly_capacity (值: None) - The number of hours per week this person is available to work in seconds. Defaults to 126000` seconds (35 hours).

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: can_create_invoices (值: None) - Whether the user can create invoices. Only applicable to Project Managers.
can_create_projects (值: None) - Whether the user can create projects. Only applicable to Project Managers.
can_see_rates (值: None) - Whether the user can see billable rates on projects. Only applicable to Project Managers.
cost_rate (值: None) - The cost rate to use for this user when calculating a project’s costs vs billable amount
default_hourly_rate (值: None) - The billable rate to use for this user when they are added to a project
email (值: None) - The user email
first_name (值: None) - The user first name
has_access_to_all_future_projects (值: None) - Whether the user should be automatically added to future projects
is_active (值: None) - Whether the user is active or archived
is_admin (值: None) - Whether the user has Admin permissions
is_contractor (值: None) - Whether the user is a contractor or an employee
is_project_manager (值: None) - Whether the user has Project Manager permissions
last_name (值: None) - The user last name
roles (值: None) - The role names assigned to this person
timezone (值: None) - The user’s timezone. Defaults to the company’s timezone. See a list of supported time zones.
weekly_capacity (值: None) - The number of hours per week this person is available to work in seconds. Defaults to 126000` seconds (35 hours).

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.description: The first name of the user
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | 作用: The first name of the user | (必填项)

clientId.name: clientId
clientId.description: The ID of the client to associate this project with
clientId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Client ID | 作用: The ID of the client to associate this project with | (必填项)

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: The ID of the project to associate with the time entry
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project ID | 作用: The ID of the project to associate with the time entry | (必填项)

expenseCategoryId.name: expenseCategoryId
expenseCategoryId.description: The ID of the expense category this expense is being tracked against
expenseCategoryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Expense Category ID | 作用: The ID of the expense category this expense is being tracked against | (必填项)

spentDate.name: spentDate
spentDate.description: The ISO 8601 formatted date the time entry was spent
spentDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Spent Date | 作用: The ISO 8601 formatted date the time entry was spent | (必填项)

isBillable.name: isBillable
isBillable.description: Whether the project is billable or not
isBillable.natural_language_description: 参数名: Is Billable | 作用: Whether the project is billable or not | 默认值: True | (必填项)

billBy.name: billBy
billBy.description: The method by which the project is invoiced
billBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Bill By | 作用: The method by which the project is invoiced | 默认值: none | (必填项)
available_options: None (值: none)
People (值: People)
Project (值: Project)
Tasks (值: Tasks)

budgetBy.name: budgetBy
budgetBy.description: The email of the user or "none"
budgetBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Budget By | 作用: The email of the user or "none" | 默认值: none | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.description: The ID of the task to associate with the time entry
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: The ID of the task to associate with the time entry | (必填项)

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.description: The last name of the user
lastName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | 作用: The last name of the user | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The email of the user | (必填项)
